title: doc: math/rand should mention Seed(seed int64) in the overview
body:
by **brian@crashlytics.com**: 
I was very surprised to learn that my calls to rand.Intn(15) were returning the same
sequence of numbers each time. Fortunately, the fine folks in IRC were able to point out
what I had not noticed, but since the intent of math/rand is different than crypto/rand,
I think people stumbling upon it would benefit from some basic guidance about the PRNG's
behavior in the overview.
